import React from'react';import{Routes,Route,NavLink,useLocation,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import BookingPage from'../Booking/BookingPage';import MyBookings from'./MyBookings';import Donations from'./Donations';import ProfileInfo from'./ProfileInfo';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Profile(){const location=useLocation();const menuItems=[{path:'info',label:'Информация'},{path:'booking',label:'Оформить бронь'},{path:'my-bookings',label:'Мои брони'},{path:'donations',label:'Донаты'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',minHeight:'80vh',fontFamily:"'Montserrat', Arial, sans-serif"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{style:{width:'220px',background:'rgba(32, 35, 54, 0.9)',padding:'1rem',borderRadius:'12px',marginRight:'2rem',color:'#c9cee3'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:'#19dfa5',marginBottom:'1rem'},children:"\u041C\u0435\u043D\u044E \u043F\u0440\u043E\u0444\u0438\u043B\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{style:{listStyle:'none',paddingLeft:0},children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{style:{margin:'1rem 0'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/profile/".concat(item.path)// абсолютный путь для корректной навигации
,end:item.path==='info'// чтобы "Информация" была активной только на точном совпадении
,style:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return{color:isActive?'#40c6f6':'#c9cee3',textDecoration:'none',fontWeight:isActive?'700':'normal'};},replace:true// заменять историю, а не добавлять
,children:item.label})},item.path))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{style:{flexGrow:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{index:true,element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"info",replace:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"info",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileInfo,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"booking",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookingPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"my-bookings",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MyBookings,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"donations",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Donations,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"\u0412\u044B\u0431\u0435\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0435 \u0440\u0430\u0437\u0434\u0435\u043B \u0432 \u043C\u0435\u043D\u044E \u0441\u043B\u0435\u0432\u0430."})})]})})]});}
